TopicTitle: How do I get the Ion Engine from the Deep Space Pack to work?

Articles.Content: I have the Deep Space pack which comes with the Ion Engine, but I cannot get it to work. I have a battery & Ion engine, and solar panels, and when I fire the Ion engine stage I get a box pop-up with a check thing to fire the engine, but whenever I click it nothing happens even at full throttle. What am I doing wrong?

Did you try clicking that ion engine switch?

If so, than I have no idea based on the little info I have
Yeah I click the thing, and nothing happens. :/

Try installing the 0.17 Perodobodobeasdsfdgklsfsfds mod, it has an ion engine in it too, see if that works (it does for me).

http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=62
Can you post the .craft file? Someone can check it out...

Did you put that resource thing in the resource file? That seems to be the cause of most problems I have seen.

kreuzeng.something
